thread.title: Russia: We're still working on retaliatory measures against Britain

title: Russia: We're still working on retaliatory measures against Britain
text:
Russia: We're still working on retaliatory measures against Britain 5:05pm IST - 00:51 
Russia's foreign ministry says retaliatory action against Britain's ''unfriendly measures'' after the Sergei Skripal poisoning are to be expected in the near future. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
